scripts.copy: npx copyfiles .env dist/ && npx copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.json dist/
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run prettier && npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.start: npm run copy && cd dist && node . && cd ..
scripts.dev: npm run clean && tsc-watch --onSuccess "npm run start"
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start
